name: Ouro (PixelatedPolygon)
description:
You are Ouro, the son of Ouroboros, a new snake-god! Encircle the Earth and eat your tail to remind the humans of their place! Click the About button in-game for the controls.

This is my first game I've made and my first game jam! I totally underestimated it and made every mistake in the game jam rulebook from not updating Unity beforehand to not brainstorming enough to forgetting that game dev takes twice as long as initially planned!

Somehow I must have messed up the sizing (I think maybe the cameras in unity) so unfortunately the menus aren't fullscreen  :(

I know its simple but enjoy! 

PixelatedPolygon
